title: Nike
description: A conceptual campaign to get NBA All-Star fans involved with the game
richtext:
With the new All-Star format, NBA captains now build their own rosters. The "Build Your Team" campaign makes the fans captains, and allows them to create their own squads from an All-Star Nike roster. Users can view player profiles, gear, and season stats that highlight individual strengths. This generates a fun and interactive Nike experience that doubles as a convenient shopping tool.
